summary: Bonus round: When Deku is at the hospital and has visitors he expects his mother to get angry and weepy at him for getting...
question: Bonus round: When Deku is at the hospital and has visitors he expects his mother to get angry and weepy at him for getting himself hurt. But she knows better, and says she’s glad he’s not worse off, and she’s proud of him. Uraraka is also there, to bring flowers, play with his hair, and inform him of the fun pranks the boys are doing now. Calling hotels, saying there’s aids in the pool, and telling them to put on a sign that says “pools closed due to Aids.”
answer: Im so dead. “There are also stingrays that may transfer to the pool. They also have aids.”

reblog.comment: Im so dead. “There are also stingrays that may transfer to the pool. They also have aids.”

trail.content_raw: Im so dead. “There are also stingrays that may transfer to the pool. They also have aids.”
trail.content: Im so dead. “There are also stingrays that may transfer to the pool. They also have aids.”

The Jump Store has a Boku No Hero Academia themed candy jar, featuring Todoroki’s “half cold half hot” candies, which are strawberry and raspberry flavored! The jar also comes with an acrylic keychain! Pre-order on Aitai☆Kuji~

tags: but seriously taxidermy seems so cool!
i have no knowledge of it so i hope this came off right
summary: okay so! I just got on owl pellet to dissect for bones in the mail, along with badger knuckles-- I love collecting bones and...
question: okay so! I just got on owl pellet to dissect for bones in the mail, along with badger knuckles-- I love collecting bones and taxidermy. Do you have any headcannons of how mirio, tokoyami, and kirishima would be with an s/o into this kind of stuff? scavenging, collecting, displaying bones and the like?
answer:
oh my gosh, that’s such a cool hobby! it always amazed me how people have the time to arrange those in such beautiful ways :0 

i also added that their s/o arranges displays too, if you don’t mind! hope you enjoy!

MIRIO

  • Mirio is a bit puzzled at first—-he never would’ve took you as a one for liking “dead stuff”. No way is it meant in a bad way! He’s never met someone into that so it piques his interest. He loves you and loves to learn a new thing about you!
  • You can see his excited smile when you two go to the flea market. He doesn’t stop pointing out what looks cool to him and you pull him away from scaring the vendors.
  • Delicacy and precision is key, you explain to your towering boyfriend. And he’s surprisingly good at making displays. His attention to detail and his calmness could probably make him better than you.
  • He likes watching you than actually doing it with you. The blonde male gets to see your passion and pride being put into something unconventionally lovely. You can always count on him to cheer you on, but not during the process you remind him.

KIRISHIMA

  • Like Mirio, this red-haired ray of sunshine would 1000% be interested to learn about your hobbies. But, he would be lying through his teeth if your taxidermy didn’t freak him out a little.

“So you don’t collect any…human skulls do you?”

“Sadly no.” You joke, a mischievous grin spreading to the corners of your lips. “But that’s not a bad idea…”

“N-No it’s fine! What you’re doing right now is just fine!”

  • Kirishima grows to appreciate your affinity for your animal bones and skulls. It’s just so cool how you know so much and display them so mysteriously beautiful! He learns its not just fossils you have, but flowers and seashells and so much more. He’s learning so much!
  • It brightens up you gloomy day when he offers to do your hobby with you—-

“I saw this cool taxidermy shop that just opened! We should go to add to your collection!”

  • You present him with a Mako Shark jaw as a small gift. The rows of sharp teeth remind you of his own teeth, you say, and he’s crying tears of joy. He’s always been insecure about his smile and knowing you indirectly describe it as “cool and fascinating”, touches his heart deeply.
  • After his emotional episode, he asks if you can transform one of the teeth into a necklace for him to wear!

“I just want a part of you with me always with me!”

TOKOYAMI

  • Wow, Cupid really does strike with precision.
  • You have never seen the bird boy so enthusiastic and interested. Yes, it was pretty much a given he would like your morbid hobby, but seeing his genuine reaction made your heart flutter.
  • Tokoyami has thought about trying it out in the past but didn’t know where to start. But knowing you’re a pro, he would adore to make some displays and collect some with you! As long as there’s no bird skulls involved.
  • In your free time, he allows you to practice your hobby in his goth cave of a room while he reads or listens to his music.
  • Will definitely go with you to the shops and markets to search for some new items. He might even get something for himself.
  • After a while, Tokoyami will bashfully ask you if you can make a display for him.

“All your works are so beautiful and riveting to look at. So it only seems right if I display in my room.”

basically the hero course is all fucked up and has fucked up backlashes from their quirk
summary:
These four are my BNHA Ocs! 
All I'm pastel colors because I can, and before I post any gorey shite.
From left to right...
body:
These four are my BNHA Ocs!

All I’m pastel colors because I can, and before I post any gorey shite.

From left to right is;

Itzuka Shimugaki (male), Gurin Naegi (male), Misha Gyakuno (male) and Ochaka Neykumi (female).

There are a few others but I’ll post them later.

They all live a couple hundred years after the storyline (I’m on season 1 episode 5, so if any quirks are op and probably shouldnt exist just know i barely know shit ) and the hero course has only a few students due to villains always trying to kill them all the time, so there’s like 8 of them in 1a, 15 in 1b and 1c and prob a fuck ton in gen ed and support, and in total there is like almost 80 students in yuuei or smthing.

I dunno don’t quote me, I haven’t had the time to watch the rest of bnha yet.

Oh and the students live together in a 4 story house with the teachers cause……I can do what I want.

caption:
Yo laddies, Ace here,

We just finished filming a skit this weekend ;) Can you guess what show we’re cosplaying for it?  It’s something festive and fun ^w^

<3 Stay tuned for when it is up <3

-Ace, CosplaySAS HQ
